value.name: Big Sky
value.overview: Private detective Cassie Dewell partners with ex-cop Jenny Hoyt on a search for two sisters who have been kidnapped by a truck driver on a remote highway in Montana. When they discover that these are not the only girls who have disappeared in the area, they must race against the clock to stop the perpetrator before another woman is taken.

value.name: Big Sky
value.overview:
Big Sky is an Australian television drama series produced by John Edwards that ran for two seasons on Network Ten from 1997 to 1999.

The show centred on the adventures of the pilots of a small aviation company in Australia called "Big Sky Aviation" and the battles of the owner to keep the company running. Chief pilot Chris Manning is determined to look after his team, even if that conflicts with the new boss, Lauren Allen, who has inherited the company following the death of her father.

value.name: Big Sky, Big Dreams, Big Art: Made in the USA
value.original_name: Big Sky, Big Dreams, Big Art: Made in the USA
value.overview: A history of American art with Waldemar Januszczak

value.name: Big Sky Kitchen with Eduardo Garcia
value.original_name: Big Sky Kitchen with Eduardo Garcia
value.overview: Montana-based chef, outdoorsman and wild food forager Eduardo Garcia hosts this cooking series inspired by his love for nature. His fun and delicious meals become food celebrations for family and friends under the big sky.

value.name: Building Off the Grid: Big Sky Ranch
value.original_name: Building Off the Grid: Big Sky Ranch
value.overview: In a remote and picturesque corner of northwestern Montana, Jon and Etta Smith are set to construct a self-sustaining “off-the-grid” farm house and bison ranch.

value.name: Banshee
value.overview: Banshee is an American drama television series set in a small town in Pennsylvania Amish country and features an enigmatic ex-con posing as a murdered sheriff who imposes his own brand of justice while also cooking up plans that serve his own interests.
